name: svgpath
description: Low level toolkit for SVG paths transformations.

scripts.covreport: nyc report --reporter html && nyc report --reporter lcov
scripts.benchmark-prepare: mkdir -p benchmark/implementations/2.4.1 && git checkout 2.4.1 && cp index.js benchmark/implementations/2.4.1 && cp -R --parents **/*.js benchmark/implementations/2.4.1 && git checkout master
